notesStmt.note: "Eglisham ... published in 1626 'Prodromus vindictae' ... A German translation appeared the same year, but the earliest English edition known of the 'Forerunner of revenge' bears date 1642, though a letter of the period ... mentions the work as an English publication, 20 May 1626"--DNB, v. 6, p. 584-585.
